ISSUE.TITLE: Renaming a query creates a copy
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug When you change the technical name of a query, the query gets duplicated instead of just renamed. ### Orchard Core version Latest main branch. ### To Reproduce 1. Edit any query and change the technical name. 2. Click on Save. 3. A new query with the new name gets added, the old query remains unchanged. ### Expected behavior The edited query should be renamed. /cc @MikeAlhayek
